text: Vincent Millot (; born 30 January 1986, in Montpellier, France) is a French former professional tennis player. Despite never reached the top 100, Millot have played at all the Grand Slams ==Career statistics== ===ATP Challenger Tour and ITF tournaments career finals=== {|class=wikitable style=font- size:97%
